sourcesContent:
<template>
  <FlexComponent :gap="'gap-0'">
    <router-link
      :style="`color: ${color};`"
      :class="addClass"
      class="text-sm hover:cursor-pointer flex items-center"
      v-for="(p, index) in path"
      :key="p.name"
      :to="p.url"
      >{{ p.name }}
      <i v-if="index < path.length - 1" class="bx mx-2 bx-chevron-right"></i
    ></router-link>
  </FlexComponent>
</template>

<script>
import FlexComponent from "./FlexComponent.vue";
export default {
  name: "BreadCrumb",
  components: {
    FlexComponent,
  },
  props: {
    path: {
      type: Array,
      default: [
        {
          name: "URL",
          url: "/",
        },
      ],
    },
    addClass: {
      type: String,
      default: "",
    },
    color: {
      type: String,
      default: "blue",
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style></style>
